thread.title: T Kennedy
thread.title_full: Vital Choice reviewed by T Kennedy

author: T Kennedy
title: T Kennedy
text: I have ordered the Salmon Oil with Lemon capsules for several years, and I will continue. Their shipping methods are very fast and I have never encountered a problem. I even ordered 12 bottles a couple of weeks ago, then the next day received a 10% coupon in the mail, and they went back and credited my order for the 10% with ease! I always recommend Vita Choice to everyone!
